quarryFrameMinHeight.#Comment: The minimum height that all quarry frames must be. A value of 1 will look strange when it drills the uppermost layer.

quarryMaxTasksPerTick.#Comment:
The maximum number of tasks that the quarry will do per tick.
(Where a task is either breaking a block, or moving the frame)

quarryPowerDivisor.#Comment:
1 divided by this value is added to the power cost for each additional task done per tick.
A value of 0 disables this behaviour.

quarryMaxFrameSpeed.#Comment:
The maximum number of blocks that the quarry is allowed to mine each second.
A value of 0 means no limit, and a value of 0.5 will mine up to half a block per second.

quarryFrameMoveBoth.#Comment: If true then the quarry frame will move with both of its axis rather than just one.

enableStencil.#Comment: If true then the architect table will correctly hide it's translucent parts behind surrounding terrain. (This looks better)
